name: Quest Party Life
description:
Train your party friends and conquer quests!
There are 5 quests in all. The training period is 12 days.

Challenge the requested quest with your party!
Quests have attributes, and the success rate of the quest changes depending on the attributes of the party members.
If you succeed in the quest, various H commands will be released.
If you fail the quest, the intimacy of your companions will decrease, so be careful.

In the training part, you can talk to your friends, invite them to eat, relax by stroking their heads, and do naughty things.
AP (action point) is set for the action of the day, and the action of the day ends when AP reaches 0.
All members must participate in the quest. Quests are inevitable. Let's grow while considering the quest.
3 party members. It's up to you whether you want to focus on training just one person or train three people in a well-balanced manner.
